description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for displaying goals, including state management, fetching goal data, and rendering a list of goal progress indicators.

classes.name: GoalsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that serves as the main container for the goals screen.

classes.name: _GoalsScreenState
classes.description: The state class for GoalsScreen, managing data fetching and UI updates.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and triggers fetching of goals when the widget is inserted into the widget tree.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, including a scaffold with an app bar and a list of goals or a loading indicator.
